title: Coronavirus: Melania Trump calls for everyone to wear a mask but president insists 'I'm choosing not to'
description: Moments after Donald Trump said he's "choosing not to" wear a face mask in public despite new guidance from federal health officials, his wife Melania Trump urged Americans to do so.
content:
Moments after Donald Trump said he's "choosing not to" wear a face mask in public despite new guidance from federal health officials, his wife Melania Trump urged Americans to do so.
The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention is now recommending American… [+1254 chars]
